title: Online Voting System
description: The Online Voting System is a secure, web-based platform designed to simplify and digitize the voting process. It enables users to cast their votes electronically, ensuring accessibility, transparency, and efficiency.

title: Hostel Electricity Bill Management
description: A digital platform for managing hostel electricity readings, billing, and student-wise consumption tracking

title: Expense Tracker
description: Expense Tracker is a fully responsive single-page application to track income and expenses in real time.Designed clean, intuitive user interface using modern CSS layout techniques.

title: Cric-score
description: A live cricket score tracker with ball-by-ball updates and automatic run rate calculation.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Rock Paper Scissors is an interactive web-based game  allowing users to play against a computer opponent with real-time score tracking
